reviewHighlights.text: BEWARE! If you live/buy this game in germany, you will have the "low-violence" version forced on you. This also counts as a different game version for...
Saints Row The Third is pure, chaotic fun. It doesn’t take itself seriously for a second, and that’s what makes it so great. wild weapons, and over-th...
